.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`CursorShape<enum_Input_CursorShape>` **CURSOR_FDIAGSIZE** = ``12``

çª—å£è°ƒæ•´å¤§å°çš„å…‰æ ‡ã€‚æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒå¤´çš„ç®­å¤´ï¼Œä»å·¦ä¸Šè§’åˆ°å³ä¸‹è§’ï¼Œä¸ :ref:`CURSOR_BDIAGSIZE<class_Input_constant_CURSOR_BDIAGSIZE>` ç›¸åã€‚å®ƒå‘Šè¯‰ç”¨æˆ·ä»–ä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ°´å¹³å’Œå‚ç›´æ–¹å‘ä¸Šè°ƒæ•´çª—å£æˆ–é¢æ¿çš„å¤§å°ã€‚

.. _class_Input_constant_CURSOR_MOVE:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`CursorShape<enum_Input_CursorShape>` **CURSOR_MOVE** = ``13``

ç§»åŠ¨å…‰æ ‡ã€‚è¡¨ç¤ºé‚£äº›ä¸œè¥¿å¯ä»¥ç§»åŠ¨ã€‚

å‚ç›´æ‹†åˆ†é¼ æ ‡å…‰æ ‡ã€‚åœ¨ Windows ä¸Šä¸ :ref:`CURSOR_VSIZE<class_Input_constant_CURSOR_VSIZE>` ç›¸åŒã€‚

è¾“å…¥ç´¯ç§¯å¯ä»¥è¢«ç¦ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥å¢åŠ  CPU ä½¿ç”¨ç‡ä¸ºä»£ä»·ï¼Œè·å¾—ç¨å¾®æ›´å…·ç²¾ç¡®æ€§/ååº”æ€§çš„è¾“å…¥ã€‚åœ¨éœ€è¦å¾’æ‰‹ç»˜åˆ¶çº¿æ¡çš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œè¾“å…¥ç´¯ç§¯é€šå¸¸åº”åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·ç»˜åˆ¶çº¿æ¡æ—¶è¢«ç¦ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥è·å¾—ä¸å®é™…è¾“å…¥éå¸¸æ¥è¿‘çš„ç»“æœã€‚

è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªä»‹äº 0 å’Œ 1 ä¹‹é—´çš„å€¼ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç»™å®šåŠ¨ä½œçš„åŸå§‹å¼ºåº¦ï¼Œå¿½ç•¥åŠ¨ä½œçš„æ­»åŒºã€‚åœ¨å¤§å¤šæ•°æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œåº”è¯¥æ”¹ç”¨ :ref:`get_action_strength<class_Input_method_get_action_strength>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_Input_method_get_joy_axis:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`float<class_float>` **get_joy_axis**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, axis\: :ref:`JoyAxis<enum_@GlobalScope_JoyAxis>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_get_joy_axis>`

è¿”å›ç»™å®šç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆå‚è§ :ref:`JoyAxis<enum_@GlobalScope_JoyAxis>`\ ï¼‰å¤„çš„æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„è½´çš„å½“å‰å€¼ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_get_joy_guid:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`String<class_String>` **get_joy_guid**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_get_joy_guid>`

Returns an SDL2-compatible device GUID on platforms that use gamepad remapping, e.g. ``030000004c050000c405000000010000``. Returns ``"Default Gamepad"`` otherwise. Godot uses the `SDL2 game controller database <https://github.com/gabomdq/SDL_GameControllerDB>`__ to determine gamepad names and mappings based on this GUID.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_get_joy_info:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Dictionary<class_Dictionary>` **get_joy_info**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_get_joy_info>`

è¿”å›å…³äºè®¾å¤‡çš„é¢å¤–å¹³å°ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯å­—å…¸ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿçš„åŸå§‹æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„åç§°ï¼Œæˆ–è€… Steam Input ç´¢å¼•ã€‚

åœ¨ Windows ä¸Šï¼Œè¯¥å­—å…¸åŒ…å«å¦‚ä¸‹å­—æ®µï¼š

\ ``xinput_index``\ ï¼šæ§åˆ¶å™¨åœ¨ XInput ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„ç´¢å¼•ã€‚

åœ¨ Linux ä¸Šï¼š

\ ``raw_name``\ ï¼šä»æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿè·å–çš„æ§åˆ¶å™¨åç§°ï¼Œæœªç» Godot æ§åˆ¶å™¨æ•°æ®åº“é‡å‘½åã€‚

\ ``vendor_id``\ ï¼šè®¾å¤‡çš„ USB ä¾›åº”å•† IDã€‚

\ ``product_id``\ ï¼šè®¾å¤‡çš„ USB äº§å“ IDã€‚

\ ``steam_input_index``\ ï¼šSteam Input æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¯¥è®¾å¤‡ä¸æ˜¯ Steam Input è®¾å¤‡åˆ™è¯¥å­—æ®µä¸å­˜åœ¨ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_get_joy_name:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`String<class_String>` **get_joy_name**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_get_joy_name>`

è¿”å›ä½äºæŒ‡å®šè®¾å¤‡ç´¢å¼•çš„æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„åç§°ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ ``PS4 Controller``\ ã€‚Godot ä½¿ç”¨ `SDL2 æ¸¸æˆæ§åˆ¶å™¨æ•°æ®åº“ <https://github.com/gabomdq/SDL_GameControllerDB>`__\ æ¥ç¡®å®šæ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„çš„åç§°ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_get_joy_vibration_duration:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`float<class_float>` **get_joy_vibration_duration**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_get_joy_vibration_duration>`

.. _class_Input_method_is_action_just_pressed:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **is_action_just_pressed**\ (\ action\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, exact_match\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>` = false\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_is_action_just_pressed>`

å½“ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨å½“å‰å¸§æˆ–ç‰©ç†å‘¨æœŸä¸­\ *å¼€å§‹*\ æŒ‰ä¸‹åŠ¨ä½œäº‹ä»¶æ—¶è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚åªåœ¨ç”¨æˆ·æŒ‰ä¸‹æŒ‰é’®çš„é‚£ä¸€å¸§æˆ–å‘¨æœŸä¸­ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚

å¦‚æœä»£ç åªéœ€è¦åœ¨åŠ¨ä½œæŒ‰ä¸‹æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯åªè¦å¤„äºæŒ‰ä¸‹çŠ¶æ€å°±æ¯å¸§éƒ½éœ€è¦æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å°±å¾ˆæœ‰ç”¨ã€‚

å¦‚æœ ``exact_match`` ä¸º ``false``\ ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šå¿½ç•¥ :ref:`InputEventKey<class_InputEventKey>` å’Œ :ref:`InputEventMouseButton<class_InputEventMouseButton>` äº‹ä»¶çš„é¢å¤–è¾“å…¥ä¿®é¥°é”®ï¼Œä»¥åŠ :ref:`InputEventJoypadMotion<class_InputEventJoypadMotion>` äº‹ä»¶çš„æ–¹å‘ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ è¿”å› ``true`` å¹¶ä¸æ„å‘³ç€è¯¥åŠ¨ä½œ\ *ä»ç„¶*\ å¤„äºæŒ‰ä¸‹çŠ¶æ€ã€‚åŠ¨ä½œåœ¨æŒ‰ä¸‹åæ˜¯å¯ä»¥å¾ˆå¿«å†é‡Šæ”¾çš„ï¼Œä¸ºäº†ä¸ä¸¢å¤±è¾“å…¥ï¼Œè¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹ä»ç„¶ä¼šè¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ç”±äºé”®ç›˜é‡å½±ï¼Œå³ä¾¿è¯¥åŠ¨ä½œçš„æŸä¸ªé”®å¤„äºæŒ‰ä¸‹çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œ\ :ref:`is_action_just_pressed<class_Input_method_is_action_just_pressed>` ä»å¯èƒ½ä¼šè¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚è¯¦æƒ…è§æ–‡æ¡£ä¸­çš„\ `ã€Šè¾“å…¥ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‹ <../tutorials/inputs/input_examples.html#keyboard-events>`__\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨è¾“å…¥å¤„ç†æœŸé—´ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ :ref:`Node._input<class_Node_private_method__input>`\ ï¼‰ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`InputEvent.is_action_pressed<class_InputEvent_method_is_action_pressed>` æ¥æŸ¥è¯¢å½“å‰äº‹ä»¶çš„åŠ¨ä½œçŠ¶æ€ã€‚

.. _class_Input_method_is_action_just_released:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

å½“ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨å½“å‰å¸§æˆ–ç‰©ç†å‘¨æœŸä¸­\ *åœæ­¢*\ æŒ‰ä¸‹åŠ¨ä½œäº‹ä»¶æ—¶è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚åªåœ¨ç”¨æˆ·æ¾å¼€æŒ‰é’®çš„é‚£ä¸€å¸§æˆ–å‘¨æœŸä¸­ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ è¿”å› ``true`` å¹¶ä¸æ„å‘³ç€è¯¥åŠ¨ä½œ\ *ä»ç„¶*\ å¤„äºæ¾å¼€çŠ¶æ€ã€‚åŠ¨ä½œåœ¨æ¾å¼€åæ˜¯å¯ä»¥å¾ˆå¿«å†æŒ‰ä¸‹çš„ï¼Œä¸ºäº†ä¸ä¸¢å¤±è¾“å…¥ï¼Œè¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹ä»ç„¶ä¼šè¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚

å¦‚æœ ``exact_match`` ä¸º ``false``\ ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šå¿½ç•¥ :ref:`InputEventKey<class_InputEventKey>` å’Œ :ref:`InputEventMouseButton<class_InputEventMouseButton>` äº‹ä»¶çš„é¢å¤–è¾“å…¥ä¿®é¥°é”®ï¼Œä»¥åŠ :ref:`InputEventJoypadMotion<class_InputEventJoypadMotion>` äº‹ä»¶çš„æ–¹å‘ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨è¾“å…¥å¤„ç†æœŸé—´ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ :ref:`Node._input<class_Node_private_method__input>`\ ï¼‰ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`InputEvent.is_action_released<class_InputEvent_method_is_action_released>` æ¥æŸ¥è¯¢å½“å‰äº‹ä»¶çš„åŠ¨ä½œçŠ¶æ€ã€‚

.. _class_Input_method_is_key_pressed:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **is_key_pressed**\ (\ keycode\: :ref:`Key<enum_@GlobalScope_Key>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_is_key_pressed>`

å¦‚æœåœ¨å½“å‰é”®ç›˜å¸ƒå±€ä¸­æ­£åœ¨æŒ‰è¯¥æ‹‰ä¸é”®ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚å¯ä»¥ä¼ é€’ä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`Key<enum_@GlobalScope_Key>` å¸¸é‡ã€‚

åªæœ‰åœ¨éæ¸¸æˆåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œæ‰æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`is_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_key_pressed>` è€Œä¸æ˜¯ :ref:`is_physical_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>`\ ã€‚è¿™å¯ç¡®ä¿å¿«æ·é”®å°†æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·çš„é”®ç›˜å¸ƒå±€æŒ‰é¢„æœŸè¿è¡Œï¼Œå› ä¸ºåœ¨éæ¸¸æˆåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œé”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®é€šå¸¸å–å†³äºé”®ç›˜å¸ƒå±€ã€‚å¦‚æœ‰ç–‘é—®ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`is_physical_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>`\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ç”±äºé”®ç›˜é‡å½±ï¼Œå³ä½¿æŒ‰ä¸‹åŠ¨ä½œçš„æŸä¸ªé”®ï¼Œ\ :ref:`is_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_key_pressed>` ä¹Ÿæœ‰å¯èƒ½ä¼šè¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚æœ‰å…³è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜…æ–‡æ¡£ä¸­çš„\ `ã€Šè¾“å…¥ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‹ <../tutorials/inputs/input_examples.html#keyboard-events>`__\ ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ­£åœ¨æŒ‰ä¸‹ç”± :ref:`MouseButton<enum_@GlobalScope_MouseButton>` æŒ‡å®šçš„é¼ æ ‡æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚

.. _class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **is_physical_key_pressed**\ (\ keycode\: :ref:`Key<enum_@GlobalScope_Key>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>`

å¦‚æœæ­£æŒ‰ä¸‹ 101/102 é”®ç¾å¼ QWERTY é”®ç›˜ç‰©ç†ä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„é”®ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚å¯ä»¥ä¼ é€’ä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`Key<enum_@GlobalScope_Key>` å¸¸é‡ã€‚

ä¸ :ref:`is_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_key_pressed>` ç›¸æ¯”ï¼Œ\ :ref:`is_physical_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>` è¢«æ¨èç”¨äºæ¸¸æˆå†…çš„åŠ¨ä½œï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ— è®ºç”¨æˆ·çš„é”®ç›˜å¸ƒå±€å¦‚ä½•ï¼Œå®ƒéƒ½ä¼šä½¿ :kbd:`W`/:kbd:`A`/:kbd:`S`/:kbd:`D` å¸ƒå±€æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚\ :ref:`is_physical_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>` è¿˜å°†ç¡®ä¿é¡¶è¡Œæ•°å­—é”®åœ¨ä»»ä½•é”®ç›˜å¸ƒå±€ä¸Šæœ‰æ•ˆã€‚å¦‚æœ‰ç–‘é—®ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`is_physical_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>`\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ç”±äºé”®ç›˜é‡å½±ï¼Œå³ä½¿æŒ‰ä¸‹åŠ¨ä½œçš„æŸä¸ªé”®ï¼Œ\ :ref:`is_physical_key_pressed<class_Input_method_is_physical_key_pressed>` ä¹Ÿæœ‰å¯èƒ½ä¼šè¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚æœ‰å…³è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜…æ–‡æ¡£ä¸­çš„\ `ã€Šè¾“å…¥ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‹ <../tutorials/inputs/input_examples.html#keyboard-events>`__\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_Input_method_parse_input_event:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **parse_input_event**\ (\ event\: :ref:`InputEvent<class_InputEvent>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_parse_input_event>`

å‘æ¸¸æˆæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`InputEvent<class_InputEvent>`\ ã€‚å¯ç”¨äºé€šè¿‡ä»£ç äººä¸ºåœ°è§¦å‘è¾“å…¥äº‹ä»¶ã€‚ä¹Ÿä¼šäº§ç”Ÿ :ref:`Node._input<class_Node_private_method__input>` è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

\ **ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š**\ 


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var cancel_event = InputEventAction.new()
    cancel_event.action = "ui_cancel"
    cancel_event.pressed = true
    Input.parse_input_event(cancel_event)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var cancelEvent = new InputEventAction();
    cancelEvent.Action = "ui_cancel";
    cancelEvent.Pressed = true;
    Input.ParseInputEvent(cancelEvent);



\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ è°ƒç”¨è¯¥å‡½æ•°ä¸ä¼šå½±å“æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œå‘é€ :ref:`InputEventMouseMotion<class_InputEventMouseMotion>` äº‹ä»¶å¹¶ä¸ä¼šå°†æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿçš„é¼ æ ‡å…‰æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®ï¼ˆè¯·æ”¹ç”¨ :ref:`warp_mouse<class_Input_method_warp_mouse>`\ ï¼‰ï¼Œå‘é€ :kbd:`Alt/Cmd + Tab` å¯¹åº”çš„ :ref:`InputEventKey<class_InputEventKey>` ä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘å½“å‰çª—å£çš„åˆ‡æ¢ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_remove_joy_mapping:

è®¾ç½®è‡ªå®šä¹‰é¼ æ ‡å…‰æ ‡å›¾åƒï¼Œè¯¥å›¾åƒä»…åœ¨æ¸¸æˆçª—å£å†…å¯è§ã€‚è¿˜å¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šçƒ­ç‚¹ã€‚å°† ``null`` ä¼ é€’ç»™ image å‚æ•°å°†é‡ç½®ä¸ºç³»ç»Ÿå…‰æ ‡ã€‚å½¢çŠ¶åˆ—è¡¨è§ :ref:`CursorShape<enum_Input_CursorShape>`\ ã€‚

\ ``image`` å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ :ref:`Texture2D<class_Texture2D>` æˆ– :ref:`Image<class_Image>`\ ï¼Œå…¶å¤§å°å¿…é¡»å°äºç­‰äº 256Ã—256ã€‚ä¸ºäº†é¿å…æ¸²æŸ“é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨å°äºç­‰äº 128Ã—128 çš„å¤§å°ã€‚

\ ``hotspot`` å¿…é¡»åœ¨ ``image`` çš„å¤§å°èŒƒå›´å†…ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ä¸æ”¯æŒä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`AnimatedTexture<class_AnimatedTexture>` ä½œä¸ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰é¼ æ ‡å…‰æ ‡ã€‚å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`AnimatedTexture<class_AnimatedTexture>`\ ï¼Œåˆ™åªä¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºç¬¬ä¸€å¸§ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ **Lossless**\ ã€\ **Lossy** æˆ– **Uncompressed** å‹ç¼©æ¨¡å¼ã€‚\ **Video RAM** å‹ç¼©æ¨¡å¼ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ï¼Œä½†ä¼šä½¿ç”¨ CPU è§£å‹ï¼Œæ‹–æ…¢åŠ è½½ï¼Œç›¸å¯¹äºæ— æŸæ¨¡å¼ä¹Ÿå¹¶ä¸èŠ‚çœå†…å­˜ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨ç½‘ç»œå¹³å°ä¸Šï¼Œå…‰æ ‡å›¾åƒå…è®¸çš„æœ€å¤§å°ºå¯¸ä¸º 128Ã—128ã€‚ å‡ºäº\ `å®‰å…¨åŸå›  <https://chromestatus.com/feature/5825971391299584>`__\ ï¼Œåªæœ‰å½“é¼ æ ‡å…‰æ ‡å›¾åƒå®Œå…¨ä½äºé¡µé¢å†…æ—¶ï¼Œå¤§äº 32Ã—32 çš„å…‰æ ‡å›¾åƒæ‰ä¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºã€‚

æŸ¥è¯¢è¾“å…¥è®¾å¤‡æ˜¯å¦åº”è¢«å¿½ç•¥ã€‚å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ ``SDL_GAMECONTROLLER_IGNORE_DEVICES`` æ¥å¿½ç•¥è®¾å¤‡ã€‚è¯·é˜…è¯» `SDL æ–‡æ¡£ <https://wiki.libsdl.org/SDL2>`__\ äº†è§£æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ æŸäº›ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹å·¥å…·å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ å¿½ç•¥è®¾å¤‡åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œ\ *SteamInput* ä»ç‰©ç†è®¾å¤‡åˆ›å»ºè™šæ‹Ÿè®¾å¤‡ä»¥è¿›è¡Œé‡æ–°æ˜ å°„ã€‚ä¸ºäº†é¿å…ä¸¤æ¬¡å¤„ç†ç›¸åŒçš„è¾“å…¥è®¾å¤‡ï¼ŒåŸå§‹è®¾å¤‡è¢«æ·»åŠ åˆ°å¿½ç•¥åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ã€‚

.. _class_Input_method_start_joy_vibration:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **start_joy_vibration**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`, weak_magnitude\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, strong_magnitude\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, duration\: :ref:`float<class_float>` = 0\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_start_joy_vibration>`

å¼€å§‹æŒ¯åŠ¨æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„ã€‚æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„é€šå¸¸å¸¦æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªéœ‡åŠ¨é©¬è¾¾ï¼Œä¸€å¼ºä¸€å¼±ã€‚\ ``weak_magnitude`` æ˜¯å¼±é©¬è¾¾çš„å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆä»‹äº 0 å’Œ 1 ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰ï¼Œ\ ``strong_magnitude`` æ˜¯å¼ºé©¬è¾¾çš„å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆä»‹äº 0 å’Œ 1 ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰ã€‚\ ``duration`` æ˜¯æ•ˆæœçš„æŒç»­æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆä»¥ç§’ä¸ºå•ä½ï¼‰ï¼ˆæŒç»­æ—¶é—´ä¸º 0 å°†å°è¯•æ— é™æœŸåœ°æ’­æ”¾æŒ¯åŠ¨ï¼‰ã€‚è°ƒç”¨ :ref:`stop_joy_vibration<class_Input_method_stop_joy_vibration>` å¯ä»¥æå‰åœæ­¢éœ‡åŠ¨ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¹¶éæ‰€æœ‰ç¡¬ä»¶éƒ½å…¼å®¹é•¿æ•ˆæœæŒç»­æ—¶é—´ï¼›å¦‚æœæ’­æ”¾çš„æ—¶é•¿å¿…é¡»è¶…è¿‡å‡ ç§’é’Ÿï¼Œå»ºè®®é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨æ•ˆæœã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¯¹äº macOSï¼Œä»… macOS 11 åŠæ›´é«˜ç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¯æŒæŒ¯åŠ¨ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_stop_joy_vibration:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **stop_joy_vibration**\ (\ device\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_stop_joy_vibration>`

åœæ­¢ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`start_joy_vibration<class_Input_method_start_joy_vibration>` å¯åŠ¨çš„æ¸¸æˆæ‰‹æŸ„çš„æŒ¯åŠ¨ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_vibrate_handheld:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **vibrate_handheld**\ (\ duration_ms\: :ref:`int<class_int>` = 500, amplitude\: :ref:`float<class_float>` = -1.0\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_vibrate_handheld>`

Vibrate the handheld device for the specified duration in milliseconds.

\ ``amplitude`` is the strength of the vibration, as a value between ``0.0`` and ``1.0``. If set to ``-1.0``, the default vibration strength of the device is used.

\ **Note:** This method is implemented on Android, iOS, and Web. It has no effect on other platforms.

\ **Note:** For Android, :ref:`vibrate_handheld<class_Input_method_vibrate_handheld>` requires enabling the ``VIBRATE`` permission in the export preset. Otherwise, :ref:`vibrate_handheld<class_Input_method_vibrate_handheld>` will have no effect.

\ **Note:** For iOS, specifying the duration is only supported in iOS 13 and later.

\ **Note:** For Web, the amplitude cannot be changed.

\ **Note:** Some web browsers such as Safari and Firefox for Android do not support :ref:`vibrate_handheld<class_Input_method_vibrate_handheld>`.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Input_method_warp_mouse:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **warp_mouse**\ (\ position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Input_method_warp_mouse>`

å°†é¼ æ ‡ä½ç½®è®¾ç½®ä¸ºæŒ‡å®šçš„å‘é‡ï¼Œå•ä½ä¸ºåƒç´ ï¼Œå¹¶ç›¸å¯¹äºå½“å‰èšç„¦çš„çª—å£ç®¡ç†å™¨æ¸¸æˆçª—å£å·¦ä¸Šè§’çš„åŸç‚¹ã€‚

å¦‚æœ :ref:`MouseMode<enum_Input_MouseMode>` è¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸º :ref:`MOUSE_MODE_CONFINED<class_Input_constant_MOUSE_MODE_CONFINED>` æˆ– :ref:`MOUSE_MODE_CONFINED_HIDDEN<class_Input_constant_MOUSE_MODE_CONFINED_HIDDEN>`\ ï¼Œåˆ™é¼ æ ‡ä½ç½®ä¼šè¢«é’³åˆ¶åœ¨å±å¹•åˆ†è¾¨ç‡çš„é™åˆ¶å†…ï¼Œæˆ–è€…é’³åˆ¶åœ¨æ¸¸æˆçª—å£çš„é™åˆ¶å†…ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`warp_mouse<class_Input_method_warp_mouse>` ä»…æ”¯æŒ Windowsã€macOS å’Œ Linuxã€‚å®ƒå¯¹ Androidã€iOS å’Œ Web æ²¡æœ‰å½±å“ã€‚

.. |virtual| replace:: :abbr:`virtual (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•é€šå¸¸éœ€è¦ç”¨æˆ·è¦†ç›–æ‰èƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚)`
.. |const| replace:: :abbr:`const (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æ²¡æœ‰å‰¯ä½œç”¨ï¼Œä¸ä¼šä¿®æ”¹è¯¥å®ä¾‹çš„ä»»ä½•æˆå‘˜å˜é‡ã€‚)`
.. |vararg| replace:: :abbr:`vararg (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•é™¤äº†èƒ½æ¥å—åœ¨æ­¤å¤„æè¿°çš„å‚æ•°å¤–ï¼Œè¿˜èƒ½å¤Ÿç»§ç»­æ¥å—ä»»æ„æ•°é‡çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚)`

.. |operator| replace:: :abbr:`operator (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æè¿°çš„æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬ç±»å‹ä½œä¸ºå·¦æ“ä½œæ•°çš„æœ‰æ•ˆæ“ä½œç¬¦ã€‚)`
.. |bitfield| replace:: :abbr:`BitField (è¿™ä¸ªå€¼æ˜¯ç”±ä¸‹åˆ—æ ‡å¿—æ„æˆçš„ä½æ©ç æ•´æ•°ã€‚)`
.. |void| replace:: :abbr:`void (æ— è¿”å›å€¼ã€‚)`
